page.title: 03ENERGY-GAS-THE FIELD
page.content: gas to make the development of the field a comercial proposition.The Morecambe field is located in comparatively shallow water,about 30metres deep.The reservoir rock,which contains the gas is only 900metres below the seabed and this has led British gas to develop a unique method for drilling production wells to recover the maximum quantity of gas.British gas are using a technique known as slant drilling with the use of a mobile jack-up drilling rig. Initially there will be three production platforms,a central procesing platform and an accomodation platform.Pipelines will link the production platforms to the processing platform where preliminary treatment of the gas will include the extraction of water before the gas is piped to the shore.
